title: #13 Heroin is Everywhere Now, and It’s Everyone’s Problem
dc:creator: Charlie Clemoes
description: Popular culture has seriously obscured our idea of where heroin is produced, who uses it, how it gets to the places where it’s used, and why it ends up in these places… this episode of the Failed Architecture Podcast sets the record straight by tracing the drug's hidden historical geography.
